definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very

sentences.english: Convenience is， however， in all affairs of life， an execrable test of value.
sentences.chinese: 然而，在生活的一切事務中投合是可惡的實用準則。

sentences.english: I was, though, completely unaware of the outrageous way the media portrays the Gypsy population.
sentences.chinese: 然而我完全不知道媒體對吉普賽人的無恥可惡的描繪。

sentences.english: She is just another double-dealing lawyer.
sentences.chinese: 她只是另一個狡猾可惡的律師。

sentences.english: I love him. It's love, not like those scummy Eagles.
sentences.chinese: 我愛他，這是愛，不像那些可惡的老鷹隊。

sentences.english: I'm not easily shocked,but his deed was too disgusting.
sentences.chinese: 我幾乎從不發火，可剛纔他的行爲實在太可惡了。

sentences.english: Another asinine article from a news media clown…
sentences.chinese: 可惡的媒體的又一篇愚蠢的文章。

sentences.english: We must get rid of these pestilential flies.
sentences.chinese: 我們得把這些可惡的蒼蠅消滅掉。

sentences.english: A foul enchantress turned me into a frog .
sentences.chinese: 一個可惡的女巫把我變成了一隻青蛙。

sentences.english: He that speaketh sophistically, is hateful: he shall be destitute of every thing.
sentences.chinese: 有的人詭辯，出言可惡，他必將缺乏各種食物。

sentences.english: You're nasty, girl. Nasty, put some clothes on, I told ya.
sentences.chinese: 可惡，跟你說過要穿上你的衣服了。

sentences.english: Snape has always loathed Harry, comparing Harry to the hated James.
sentences.chinese: 斯內普一直恨哈利，把哈利與可惡的詹姆斯作比較。

sentences.english: And the humanity theory of either goodness or wickedness emphasized the necessity of humanizing populace by sage.
sentences.chinese: 同時可善可惡的人性論強調了聖人教化民衆的必要性。

sentences.english: When an artist deserts to the side of the angels it is the most odious of treasons.
sentences.chinese: 藝術家投合傳統派的觀點，便是最可惡的叛逆行爲。

sentences.english: The circulation of gossip is vicious.
sentences.chinese: 傳播流言蜚語是可惡的。

sentences.english: Don't be a rat fink, Jack.
sentences.chinese: 不要可惡地打小報告，傑克。

definition: to remain silent/to have nothing to say/(coll.) speechless/dumbfounded
Nyima county, Tibetan: Nyi ma rdzong in Nagchu prefecture 那曲地區|那曲地区[Na4 qu3 di4 qu1], central Tibet
